# wcs-skeleton-rectangle



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Use a skeleton rectangle as a placeholder for large images or square-shaped components

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                       | Type                                      | Default   |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `animation` | `animation` | Specifies the animation of the skeleton                           | `"glide" \| "none" \| "pulse"`            | `'glide'` |
| `height`    | `height`    | Specifies the height of the skeleton (can be any valid CSS value) | `LengthOrPercentage \| Keyword \| Global` | `'auto'`  |
| `rounded`   | `rounded`   | Adds a border radius on the skeleton if true                      | `boolean`                                 | `false`   |
| `width`     | `width`     | Specifies the width of the skeleton (can be any valid CSS value)  | `LengthOrPercentage \| Keyword \| Global` | `'auto'`  |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
